channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Untaxed vehicle left in residents car park, 20th June
item.description:
For the last 3 weeks a blue VW beetle, reg KY58 UNG, has been left in the residents car park behind 20 jubilee way (not my address, closest door number i could see). DVLA advises its untaxed, and its also missing a headlight. Wasn't here prior to 3 weeks and theres no parking permit, so its not a residents vehicle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jubilee Way, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering in gated walk way, 20th June
item.description:
Bag after bag of rubbish dumped in this spot. Each carrier bag tied in a similar way, looks like the same person is using this area to dump their household waste. Attracting wildlife and generally horrible for the residents and community.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Windus Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged road surface - Iris Crescent, 20th June
item.description:
Crack in road surface outside number 3 and anytime a vehicle goes over this can hear a noise and can feel the road move up and down. The crack runs right across the road. Please can someone look into this asap.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iris Crescent, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown weeds - Iris Crescent, 20th June
item.description:
Weeds growing in the guttering all the way up the road. someone attended yesterday in the truck but this didn't stop near the guttering. Please can the weeds be cleared.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iris Crescent, Upper Belvedere, London

item.title: Close to Mansion block on top end of Sumatra Road, 20th June
item.description:
A yellow pavement ramp has been left for months on the pavement by either a utility or roadworks. It’s a real nuisance for buggy users like myself who have to navigate around it, I once even almost tipped my buggy trying to go around it. Please remove.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sumatra Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
